Text.jp: I'd much rather have a dog than a wife!

Text.jp: The main thing is not to cause troubles

Text.jp: One is good, but two is better!

Text.jp: Grandma, Grandpa... We haven't seen each other for ages... They taught me all farming wisdoms. It used to be happy time...
Text.sc: Grandma, Grandpa... We haven't seen each other for ages... They taught me all farming wisdoms. It used to be happy time...

Text.jp: Now I have my own farm, and I know what great work a farm implies. Ah... It's time to get back to work.
Text.sc: Now I have my own farm, and I know what great work a farm implies. Ah... It's time to get back to work.

Text.jp: Grandma, Grandpa, Hello! We haven't seen each other for ages...
Text.sc: Grandma, Grandpa, Hello! We haven't seen each other for ages...

Text.jp: Hi, come on in! We've just thought of you!
Text.sc: Hi, come on in! We've just thought of you!

Text.jp: Hello, my dear! Let's go inside! Oh, why am sitting here? I wanted to bake a pie, but there're no eggs here. I'll bring some!
Text.sc: Hello, my dear! Let's go inside! Oh, why am sitting here? I wanted to bake a pie, but there're no eggs here. I'll bring some!

Text.jp: Wait a second, I'll call a helper. Hey, Wheel! Come here!
Text.sc: Wait a second, I'll call a helper. Hey, Wheel! Come here!

Text.jp: This is the Wheel! We bought it to help us, but it turned out that it can do nothing! Instead...
Text.sc: This is the Wheel! We bought it to help us, but it turned out that it can do nothing! Instead...

Text.jp: I know everything! I was a guide robot in the museum of the history of farming. Nice to meet you!
Text.sc: I know everything! I was a guide robot in the museum of the history of farming. Nice to meet you!

Text.jp:
Hello dear Grandma and Grandpa! 

How are you? Sorry for being silent for so long! How are the sheep, kitten, dog, and other animals? You miss me, don't you? I do miss you, too! Thank you very much for your invitation, Finally I have a chance to visit you! See you soon,

your grandson
Text.sc:
Hello dear Grandma and Grandpa! 

How are you? Sorry for being silent for so long! How are the sheep, kitten, dog, and other animals? You miss me, don't you? I do miss you, too! Thank you very much for your invitation, Finally I have a chance to visit you! See you soon,

your grandson

Text.jp:
Hello dear Grandma and Grandpa!

How are you? Sorry for being silent for so long! How are the sheep, kitten, dog, and other animals? You miss me, don't you? I do miss you, too! Thank you very much for your invitation, Finally I have a chance to visit you! See you soon,

your granddaughter
Text.sc:
Hello dear Grandma and Grandpa!

How are you? Sorry for being silent for so long! How are the sheep, kitten, dog, and other animals? You miss me, don't you? I do miss you, too! Thank you very much for your invitation, Finally I have a chance to visit you! See you soon,

your granddaughter

Text.jp: Good morning! Oh, what is it?
Text.sc: Good morning! Oh, what is it?

Text.jp: Ah! Again! When will this end?
Text.sc: Ah! Again! When will this end?

Text.jp: Again? It isn't the first time to happen, right?
Text.sc: Again? It isn't the first time to happen, right?

Text.jp: Yes. Something strange is constantly happening! Either clouds appear on the sky or the well is ruined...
Text.sc: Yes. Something strange is constantly happening! Either clouds appear on the sky or the well is ruined...

Text.jp: And now animals disappear. Last week, a pig disappeared, now a cow...
Text.sc: And now animals disappear. Last week, a pig disappeared, now a cow...

Text.jp: I'll stay here and look after the place, and you take a rest. A rather troublesome morning!
Text.sc: I'll stay here and look after the place, and you take a rest. A rather troublesome morning!

Text.jp: I could have done without that! We must catch it!
Text.sc: I could have done without that! We must catch it!

Text.jp:
Good day!

I want to remind that it's time for mortgage payment. I hope you won't have troubles with this. I'm planning to visit you very soon!

Sincerely yours, Trader John Smith.
Text.sc:
Good day!

I want to remind that it's time for mortgage payment. I hope you won't have troubles with this. I'm planning to visit you very soon!

Sincerely yours, Trader John Smith.

Text.jp: Hello! What a nice day. I love to travel to the country. Fresh air, sunshine, landscapes. What else does anyone need?
Text.sc: Hello! What a nice day. I love to travel to the country. Fresh air, sunshine, landscapes. What else does anyone need?

Text.jp: Nice to meet you. It's a wonderful day today! You're here on business, aren't you?
Text.sc: Nice to meet you. It's a wonderful day today! You're here on business, aren't you?

Text.jp: Ah, Yes... I wish to remind you that you are to pay off the mortgage for the farm. I hope you haven't forgotten about it?
Text.sc: Ah, Yes... I wish to remind you that you are to pay off the mortgage for the farm. I hope you haven't forgotten about it?

Text.jp: Of course, no. Unfortunately, we're not doing well these days. Animals started to disappear on the farm! Can I ask for a delay?
Text.sc: Of course, no. Unfortunately, we're not doing well these days. Animals started to disappear on the farm! Can I ask for a delay?

Text.jp: Well I do not know, I was too kind to you. I need a helper in my business, if you find a suitable person, I'll give you this delay.
Text.sc: Well I do not know, I was too kind to you. I need a helper in my business, if you find a suitable person, I'll give you this delay.

Text.jp: Hmm, well, if you're not afraid of hard work, you're welcome. If you help me, I'll agree for the payment delay.
Text.sc: Hmm, well, if you're not afraid of hard work, you're welcome. If you help me, I'll agree for the payment delay.

Text.jp: The last task is completed. And what?
Text.sc: The last task is completed. And what?

Text.jp: Nice job! Now I see that young people is not beyond recovery! OK, I'll give you a delay. But remember that you still owe me! If you want to help your family, go to town. It is always possible to find an appropriate job!
Text.sc: Nice job! Now I see that young people is not beyond recovery! OK, I'll give you a delay. But remember that you still owe me! If you want to help your family, go to town. It is always possible to find an appropriate job!

Text.jp: Grandma, Grandpa, hi! I received your letter and immediately came here! We haven't seen each other for so long!
Text.sc: Grandma, Grandpa, hi! I received your letter and immediately came here! We haven't seen each other for so long!

Text.jp: Grandma, Grandpa, hi! I received your letter and immediately came here! We haven't seen each other for so long!
Text.sc: Grandma, Grandpa, hi! I received your letter and immediately came here! We haven't seen each other for so long!

Text.jp: I hope I'll find some work for me here! I can not sit idle!
Text.sc: I hope I'll find some work for me here! I can not sit idle!

Text.jp: I see a real farmer in front of me! It's always plenty of work on the farm!
Text.sc: I see a real farmer in front of me! It's always plenty of work on the farm!

Text.jp: I've just arrived and we're talking about work! Come in for a cup of tea, and then go to work.
Text.sc: I've just arrived and we're talking about work! Come in for a cup of tea, and then go to work.

Text.jp: Welcome to our city! You arrived just in time! We're going to celebrate the Farmer's Day soon! This will be a magnificent holiday, you must be there!
Text.sc: Welcome to our city! You arrived just in time! We're going to celebrate the Farmer's Day soon! This will be a magnificent holiday, you must be there!

Text.jp: Hello! It's my pleasure to attend the celebration. For now, I'd like to know if there's any work I can do for you?
Text.sc: Hello! It's my pleasure to attend the celebration. For now, I'd like to know if there's any work I can do for you?

Text.jp: Hmm, we need to prepare many goods for the Farmer's Day. If you can help us with this task, it would be great.
Text.sc: Hmm, we need to prepare many goods for the Farmer's Day. If you can help us with this task, it would be great.

Text.jp: Have a nice day. I hazard a guess... Do you own a farm? I'm in despear! I ran out of food, but I can't buy anything on the city market - everyone is preparing for the holiday! Could you possibly help me?
Text.sc: Have a nice day. I hazard a guess... Do you own a farm? I'm in despear! I ran out of food, but I can't buy anything on the city market - everyone is preparing for the holiday! Could you possibly help me?

Text.jp: It's my pleasure to help you! Let me know if there's anything you need.
Text.sc: It's my pleasure to help you! Let me know if there's anything you need.

Text.jp: Wonderful! You really helped us. Now everything is ready for the holiday. Come with your grandparents and let's have fun together!
Text.sc: Wonderful! You really helped us. Now everything is ready for the holiday. Come with your grandparents and let's have fun together!

Text.jp: I'll be happy to see you in my restaurant. And by the way, if you still are looking for a job, talk to the village elder. He needs help.
Text.sc: I'll be happy to see you in my restaurant. And by the way, if you still are looking for a job, talk to the village elder. He needs help.

Text.jp: I'm glad to meet you in the village. Guests are rather rare here.
Text.sc: I'm glad to meet you in the village. Guests are rather rare here.

Text.jp: Hello! The city chief cook told me that you were looking for an assistant.
Text.sc: Hello! The city chief cook told me that you were looking for an assistant.

Text.jp: It's not a good idea to ask guests for help... Completely agree! We lack of workers these days. Does it mean that you can help us?
Text.sc: It's not a good idea to ask guests for help... Completely agree! We lack of workers these days. Does it mean that you can help us?

Text.jp: Of course, that's why I'm here.
Text.sc: Of course, that's why I'm here.

Text.jp: You might not continue! I need help and I don't have time for talks!
Text.sc: You might not continue! I need help and I don't have time for talks!

Text.jp: I can help... I don't know if I want you to help me...
Text.sc: I can help... I don't know if I want you to help me...

Text.jp: Oh, where are my manners? I apologize for all this fuss! Lack of products drives me crazy! So, you say that you can help... It's just in time!
Text.sc: Oh, where are my manners? I apologize for all this fuss! Lack of products drives me crazy! So, you say that you can help... It's just in time!

Text.jp: Grandma, Grandpa! Now I have money to pay for the farm.
Text.sc: Grandma, Grandpa! Now I have money to pay for the farm.

Text.jp: Thank you! I don't know what we would have done without you!
Text.sc: Thank you! I don't know what we would have done without you!

Text.jp: But that's not all news. The confectioner from the village saw an object flying right here...
Text.sc: But that's not all news. The confectioner from the village saw an object flying right here...

Text.jp: You see? Do you all see it? And I thought I drive crazy! The UFO again!
Text.sc: You see? Do you all see it? And I thought I drive crazy! The UFO again!

Text.jp: I'll go with you; it can be dangerous.
Text.sc: I'll go with you; it can be dangerous.

Text.jp: Old age is not a blessing. I've never thought that I'd live until I start seeing aliens!
Text.sc: Old age is not a blessing. I've never thought that I'd live until I start seeing aliens!

Text.jp: Hello! We are glad to welcome you on our planet.
Text.sc: Hello! We are glad to welcome you on our planet.

Text.jp: Hello! I need help. The spaceship won't fly without fuel! I have to go back home.
Text.sc: Hello! I need help. The spaceship won't fly without fuel! I have to go back home.

Text.jp: So you need fuel for the spaceship to get back home, right? What fuel do you use?
Text.sc: So you need fuel for the spaceship to get back home, right? What fuel do you use?

Text.jp: I use food! It's alive and understands everything; though it cannot talk.
Text.sc: I use food! It's alive and understands everything; though it cannot talk.

Text.jp: This is not a problem! We will immediately provide you with food!
Text.sc: This is not a problem! We will immediately provide you with food!

Text.jp: I must confess in something shameful... I stole animals and messed around...
Text.sc: I must confess in something shameful... I stole animals and messed around...

Text.jp: I knew that! I've thought of who could do that... Now I see... Should I help every green... alien after that?
Text.sc: I knew that! I've thought of who could do that... Now I see... Should I help every green... alien after that?

Text.jp: I'm ashamed! Please don't blame me. The trader made me do that!
Text.sc: I'm ashamed! Please don't blame me. The trader made me do that!

Text.jp: He took the Tire... He said he'd never return it back... If I didn't create mess on your farm... Forgive me, I'll never do this again.
Text.sc: He took the Tire... He said he'd never return it back... If I didn't create mess on your farm... Forgive me, I'll never do this again.

Text.jp: All is clear to me now! The trader forces the alien to do harm, so you won't be able to pay the mortgage for the farm!
Text.sc: All is clear to me now! The trader forces the alien to do harm, so you won't be able to pay the mortgage for the farm!

Text.jp: The spaceship is almost full! Will you never help me again?
Text.sc: The spaceship is almost full! Will you never help me again?

Text.jp: We WILL help you, if you do a service for us, in return. How much more fuel do you need to fly to the farm?
Text.sc: We WILL help you, if you do a service for us, in return. How much more fuel do you need to fly to the farm?

Text.jp: Let's fuel the UFO and visit the trader. Then let's fly to the city. The Farmer's Day holiday will start soon. People from all over the world will gather there. For them, it would be interesting to know about what happened here.
Text.sc: Let's fuel the UFO and visit the trader. Then let's fly to the city. The Farmer's Day holiday will start soon. People from all over the world will gather there. For them, it would be interesting to know about what happened here.

Text.jp: And now, while grandfather and the alien are persuading the trader to confess, I should collect enough fuel for the spaceship to reach its home.
Text.sc: And now, while grandfather and the alien are persuading the trader to confess, I should collect enough fuel for the spaceship to reach its home.

Text.jp: Welcome! You've just arrived in time! We're celebrating the Farmer's Day!
Text.sc: Welcome! You've just arrived in time! We're celebrating the Farmer's Day!

Text.jp: Hmm... I did harm on the Crop's farm deliberately. I wanted to own their farm and sell it. I made the alien do all that harm. Forgive me if you can...
Text.sc: Hmm... I did harm on the Crop's farm deliberately. I wanted to own their farm and sell it. I made the alien do all that harm. Forgive me if you can...

Text.jp: What you've done is very bad, John. You have to pay for this! You will have to work on the farm of Mr Crop and give all his money back.
Text.sc: What you've done is very bad, John. You have to pay for this! You will have to work on the farm of Mr Crop and give all his money back.

Text.jp: It's the Farmer Day today! Join us! You will start tomorrow!
Text.sc: It's the Farmer Day today! Join us! You will start tomorrow!

Text.jp: Let's start our annual holiday, my friends! Happy Farmer's Day!
Text.sc: Let's start our annual holiday, my friends! Happy Farmer's Day!

Text.jp: Let's start with a simple task. This is a hen. It eats grass and produces eggs.
Text.sc: Let's start with a simple task. This is a hen. It eats grass and produces eggs.

Text.jp: Use the water from the well to water the field. Click on field to grow grass.
Text.sc: Use the water from the well to water the field. Click on field to grow grass.

Text.jp: Grass is planted, but you're run of water. Click on the well, to refill it.
Text.sc: Grass is planted, but you're run of water. Click on the well, to refill it.

Text.jp: Wonderful! To complete the level, you need to collect three more eggs. Let's buy one more hen and finish the task faster. To buy a hen, click on this button.
Text.sc: Wonderful! To complete the level, you need to collect three more eggs. Let's buy one more hen and finish the task faster. To buy a hen, click on this button.

Text.jp: Thus you will reach your goal faster. By the way, you need to collect just three eggs. Hurry up, your grandmother is waiting for you!
Text.sc: Thus you will reach your goal faster. By the way, you need to collect just three eggs. Hurry up, your grandmother is waiting for you!

Text.jp: Hurry if you want to complete the level with gold.
Text.sc: Hurry if you want to complete the level with gold.

Text.jp: Time is running out! This time, I will help you complete the level with gold. You will get one more minute to complete the level. Next time, try to achieve a better result on your own!
Text.sc: Time is running out! This time, I will help you complete the level with gold. You will get one more minute to complete the level. Next time, try to achieve a better result on your own!

Text.jp: This is a building purchase button. Click on it to construct a building.
Text.sc: This is a building purchase button. Click on it to construct a building.

Text.jp: You have constructed a Mixer! It processes eggs and makes egg blend required to produce egg flour.
Text.sc: You have constructed a Mixer! It processes eggs and makes egg blend required to produce egg flour.

Text.jp: All products are sent to the storehouse. You can also see all animals you own here. Click on the storehouse to see what's inside.
Text.sc: All products are sent to the storehouse. You can also see all animals you own here. Click on the storehouse to see what's inside.

Text.jp: Look everything around and leave the building by clicking on the corresponding button.
Text.sc: Look everything around and leave the building by clicking on the corresponding button.

Text.jp: Send an egg to the Mixer to make your first blend!
Text.sc: Send an egg to the Mixer to make your first blend!

Text.jp: Use the truck to send goods and animals for sale. Just click on it.
Text.sc: Use the truck to send goods and animals for sale. Just click on it.

Text.jp: Here you can select a good or an animal for sale. Let's sell egg blend. Move your mouse over the product.
Text.sc: Here you can select a good or an animal for sale. Let's sell egg blend. Move your mouse over the product.

Text.jp: Select the number of items you would like to sale. For now, you have only one egg blend, so click on the button ALL to load the product in the truck.
Text.sc: Select the number of items you would like to sale. For now, you have only one egg blend, so click on the button ALL to load the product in the truck.

Text.jp: Click this button to send the truck to the city.
Text.sc: Click this button to send the truck to the city.

Text.jp: Lookk at this window to see the progress. Once the truck returns from the city, you will get profit.
Text.sc: Lookk at this window to see the progress. Once the truck returns from the city, you will get profit.

Text.jp: Ah! Again... What is it? My sensors say that it's a thief mole! They appear in the most unexpected moment and can steal your products! Let's teach him a lesson!
Text.sc: Ah! Again... What is it? My sensors say that it's a thief mole! They appear in the most unexpected moment and can steal your products! Let's teach him a lesson!

Text.jp: Be careful and watch your goods! Otherwise, you can lose them. These moles are such villains... Complete your tasks, but be careful! It seems to me, another mole is nearby!
Text.sc: Be careful and watch your goods! Otherwise, you can lose them. These moles are such villains... Complete your tasks, but be careful! It seems to me, another mole is nearby!

Text.jp: Look! This is a combo multiplier. Every time you do something useful, the combo multiplier fills. When you do nothing, it starts reducing.
Text.sc: Look! This is a combo multiplier. Every time you do something useful, the combo multiplier fills. When you do nothing, it starts reducing.

Text.jp: The combo multiplier has several marks and a certain sum next to each mark that you get once you reach this or that mark. Let's try to reach the first mark!
Text.sc: The combo multiplier has several marks and a certain sum next to each mark that you get once you reach this or that mark. Let's try to reach the first mark!

Text.jp: Grow grass to start filling the combo multiplier.
Text.sc: Grow grass to start filling the combo multiplier.

Text.jp: There are items that help to fill the combo multiplier. This owl is one of these items! They are hidden on the game scene and can be anything, even a leaf under a tree or a flying butterfly!
Text.sc: There are items that help to fill the combo multiplier. This owl is one of these items! They are hidden on the game scene and can be anything, even a leaf under a tree or a flying butterfly!

Text.jp: Click on the owl, to fill the combo multiplier!
Text.sc: Click on the owl, to fill the combo multiplier!

Text.jp: Wonderful! Try to find all hidden items. They will help to fill the combo multiplier faster.
Text.sc: Wonderful! Try to find all hidden items. They will help to fill the combo multiplier faster.

Text.jp: In the name of the binary code, what is it?! Verifying database... It's... A BEAR! Bears scare animals and prevent them from producing goods.
Text.sc: In the name of the binary code, what is it?! Verifying database... It's... A BEAR! Bears scare animals and prevent them from producing goods.

Text.jp: For catching a bear, use packaging materials! You can sell a caught bear on the market in the city.
Text.sc: For catching a bear, use packaging materials! You can sell a caught bear on the market in the city.

Text.jp: As this is the first time you use the combo multiplier, I'll prevent the bar from reducing. Try to perform something useful to reacht he goal.
Text.sc: As this is the first time you use the combo multiplier, I'll prevent the bar from reducing. Try to perform something useful to reacht he goal.

Text.jp: You can earn money using the combo multiplier, but you need to clear its bar first. To clear the bar, do nothing for some time or exceed the maximum mark of the combo multiplier.
Text.sc: You can earn money using the combo multiplier, but you need to clear its bar first. To clear the bar, do nothing for some time or exceed the maximum mark of the combo multiplier.

Text.jp: Click on the UPGRADE button to get the Mixer of level 2. Upgraded buildings can produce more good.
Text.sc: Click on the UPGRADE button to get the Mixer of level 2. Upgraded buildings can produce more good.

Text.jp: I don't want to disturb you anymore. Improve your skills while I'm recharging. The training is so exhausting.
Text.sc: I don't want to disturb you anymore. Improve your skills while I'm recharging. The training is so exhausting.

Text.jp: Animals can feel liking to each other. When this happens, they produce a unique product, which cannot be sold, but you can use it.
Text.sc: Animals can feel liking to each other. When this happens, they produce a unique product, which cannot be sold, but you can use it.

Text.jp: Move your mouse over the animal icon to see what animal it feels liking.
Text.sc: Move your mouse over the animal icon to see what animal it feels liking.

Text.jp: It seems the hen feels liking to the pig that produces meat. You own several hens, so just purchase one pig, and see what will happen!
Text.sc: It seems the hen feels liking to the pig that produces meat. You own several hens, so just purchase one pig, and see what will happen!

Text.jp: To buy a pig, click on its icon.
Text.sc: To buy a pig, click on its icon.

Text.jp: The hen and the pig produced a unique egg! Click on it, and all animals on the field will produce goods. To learn how to use the unique product, move the mouse cursor over it.
Text.sc: The hen and the pig produced a unique egg! Click on it, and all animals on the field will produce goods. To learn how to use the unique product, move the mouse cursor over it.

Text.jp: Click on the unique object to grab it.
Text.sc: Click on the unique object to grab it.

Text.jp: You need to buy certain goods only in the city. For example, sugar that you need to make cakes, can be bought in the city.
Text.sc: You need to buy certain goods only in the city. For example, sugar that you need to make cakes, can be bought in the city.

Text.jp: Use the plane to deliver products from the city.
Text.sc: Use the plane to deliver products from the city.

Text.jp: The steps are the same as if you send goods for sale. Try to order some sugar without my help!
Text.sc: The steps are the same as if you send goods for sale. Try to order some sugar without my help!

Text.jp: Excellent, you have succeeded! Just wait when the sugar is delivered, and start baking cakes.
Text.sc: Excellent, you have succeeded! Just wait when the sugar is delivered, and start baking cakes.

Text.jp: I've taught you everything I know about farming. You know a lot, so you will become a great farmer!
Text.sc: I've taught you everything I know about farming. You know a lot, so you will become a great farmer!

Text.jp: This is a cow. It eats grass and gives milk for making cream.
Text.sc: This is a cow. It eats grass and gives milk for making cream.

Text.jp: This is a sheep. It eats grass and produces wool for making threads.
Text.sc: This is a sheep. It eats grass and produces wool for making threads.

Text.jp: This is a cat. It collects products on the field and takes them from moles.
Text.sc: This is a cat. It collects products on the field and takes them from moles.

Text.jp: This is a dog. It helps to catch bears.
Text.sc: This is a dog. It helps to catch bears.

Text.jp: This is a clever mole. Do you see a bucket on its head? It protects the mole from the hammer and allows it to stay on the field longer.
Text.sc: This is a clever mole. Do you see a bucket on its head? It protects the mole from the hammer and allows it to stay on the field longer.

Text.jp: This is the most cunning mole. It wears a hard hat to protect itself and stay on the field for long.
Text.sc: This is the most cunning mole. It wears a hard hat to protect itself and stay on the field for long.

Text.jp: This is a Dryer. It produces egg flour required for making pancakes of egg blend.
Text.sc: This is a Dryer. It produces egg flour required for making pancakes of egg blend.

Text.jp: This is a Bakery. It produces pancakes required for making cakes of egg flour.
Text.sc: This is a Bakery. It produces pancakes required for making cakes of egg flour.

Text.jp: This is a Confectionery. It produces delicious cakes of pancakes and sugar.
Text.sc: This is a Confectionery. It produces delicious cakes of pancakes and sugar.

Text.jp: This is a Separator. It produces cream required for making butter of milk.
Text.sc: This is a Separator. It produces cream required for making butter of milk.

Text.jp: This is a Butterblender. It produces butter required for making cheese from cream.
Text.sc: This is a Butterblender. It produces butter required for making cheese from cream.

Text.jp: This is a Cheese Factory. It produces the tastiest cheese of butter and enzyme.
Text.sc: This is a Cheese Factory. It produces the tastiest cheese of butter and enzyme.

Text.jp: This is a Butchery. It produces steaks required for making sausages of pork meat.
Text.sc: This is a Butchery. It produces steaks required for making sausages of pork meat.

Text.jp: This is a Sausage Factory. It produces sausages required for making smoked sausages of steaks.
Text.sc: This is a Sausage Factory. It produces sausages required for making smoked sausages of steaks.

Text.jp: This is a Smoke Factory. It produces smoked sausages required for making grill sausages of sausages.
Text.sc: This is a Smoke Factory. It produces smoked sausages required for making grill sausages of sausages.

Text.jp: This is a Grill Factory. It produces grill sausages of smoked sausages and coal.
Text.sc: This is a Grill Factory. It produces grill sausages of smoked sausages and coal.

Text.jp: This is a Spinnery. It produces threads required for making cloths of wool.
Text.sc: This is a Spinnery. It produces threads required for making cloths of wool.

Text.jp: This is a Weaving Factory. It produces cloth required for making painted cloth of threads.
Text.sc: This is a Weaving Factory. It produces cloth required for making painted cloth of threads.

Text.jp: This is a Paint Factory. It produces painted cloth required for making clothes of cloth.
Text.sc: This is a Paint Factory. It produces painted cloth required for making clothes of cloth.

Text.jp: This is a Studio. It produces beautiful clothes of painted cloths and chalk.
Text.sc: This is a Studio. It produces beautiful clothes of painted cloths and chalk.

Text.jp: This is your Farm. Here you can view your achivements, exchange collection items, change clothes of your character, read info about animals. Click on the building to open the menu you're interested in.
Text.sc: This is your Farm. Here you can view your achivements, exchange collection items, change clothes of your character, read info about animals. Click on the building to open the menu you're interested in.

Text.jp: This is your House. Here you can choose who your character will look like.
Text.sc: This is your House. Here you can choose who your character will look like.

Text.jp: This is a Store. Here you can exchange collected elements of collections. Fill empty slots with the elements that you want to change, and then click EXCHANGE button!
Text.sc: This is a Store. Here you can exchange collected elements of collections. Fill empty slots with the elements that you want to change, and then click EXCHANGE button!

Text.jp: Here are all the animals you can see at the farm. Learn more about each of them.
Text.sc: Here are all the animals you can see at the farm. Learn more about each of them.

Text.jp: You acquired an item for your collection! Collect items of collection and get various bonuses\nComplete a level with gold and get two collection items. Complete a level with silver and get one item. You can complete one level several times to get as much collection items as possible.
Text.sc: You acquired an item for your collection! Collect items of collection and get various bonuses\nComplete a level with gold and get two collection items. Complete a level with silver and get one item. You can complete one level several times to get as much collection items as possible.

Text.jp: Congratulations, you managed to help not only grandparents but also all the people of the world!
Text.sc: Congratulations, you managed to help not only grandparents but also all the people of the world!

Text.jp: In this house you can see all possible collections and learn what items you've collected.
Text.sc: In this house you can see all possible collections and learn what items you've collected.

Text.jp: You've collected all items of the collection, and now can use it! Click on an empty slot in the collction window and then choose the collection you need.
Text.sc: You've collected all items of the collection, and now can use it! Click on an empty slot in the collction window and then choose the collection you need.

Text.jp: This is a level icon. Click it to start the latest available level.
Text.sc: This is a level icon. Click it to start the latest available level.

Text.jp: This is the map. It displays all game levels.
Text.sc: This is the map. It displays all game levels.

Text.jp: Click this button to get to the farm!
Text.sc: Click this button to get to the farm!

Text.jp: Unique egg\nmakes all animals on the field produce goods.
Text.sc: Unique egg\nmakes all animals on the field produce goods.

Text.jp: Warm sweater\nfills the combo multiplier bar up to the nearest mark immediately.
Text.sc: Warm sweater\nfills the combo multiplier bar up to the nearest mark immediately.

Text.jp: Delivers products and animals to the city for sale.
Text.sc: Delivers products and animals to the city for sale.

Text.jp: Delivers special goods from the city.
Text.sc: Delivers special goods from the city.

Text.jp: If you restart the level, the entire progress will be lost!\nRestart the level?
Text.sc: If you restart the level, the entire progress will be lost!\nRestart the level?

Text.jp: Grow grass to feed animals. Don't forget to feed animals. Without food, they starve and fall asleep!\nClick on empty field slots to grow grass.
Text.sc: Grow grass to feed animals. Don't forget to feed animals. Without food, they starve and fall asleep!\nClick on empty field slots to grow grass.

Text.jp: Don't forget to refill the well and water the field and grow grass for animals.\nClick on the well to refill it. It will cost you a certain amount of money!
Text.sc: Don't forget to refill the well and water the field and grow grass for animals.\nClick on the well to refill it. It will cost you a certain amount of money!

Text.jp: Watch your animals, they can produce required products! \nTo collect a product, click on it.
Text.sc: Watch your animals, they can produce required products! \nTo collect a product, click on it.

Text.jp: All collected products are sent to the storehouse.\nClick on the building to see all collected and produced goods, all animals that you own and caught bears.
Text.sc: All collected products are sent to the storehouse.\nClick on the building to see all collected and produced goods, all animals that you own and caught bears.

Text.jp: To buy an animal, click on its icon.
Text.sc: To buy an animal, click on its icon.

Text.jp: For producing expensive and exquisite products you need Factories. To build one, click the construction button.
Text.sc: For producing expensive and exquisite products you need Factories. To build one, click the construction button.

Text.jp: Click on the building to send products for processing. Make sure that you have all necessary ingredients.
Text.sc: Click on the building to send products for processing. Make sure that you have all necessary ingredients.

Text.jp: Once the building finishes processing, you will get a new good. Collect products next to factories.
Text.sc: Once the building finishes processing, you will get a new good. Collect products next to factories.

Text.jp: Upgrade your buildings by clicking on corresponding buttons. It will cost you money, but the building will produce more products at once.
Text.sc: Upgrade your buildings by clicking on corresponding buttons. It will cost you money, but the building will produce more products at once.

Text.jp: Sometimes, to achieve a goal, you need to replace one building with another one. Note that a replaced building demolishes along with its upgrades! Of course, you can build it again, but it will cost you money and time.\nIf you replace the building while it's processing something, you'll lose the processed products.
Text.sc: Sometimes, to achieve a goal, you need to replace one building with another one. Note that a replaced building demolishes along with its upgrades! Of course, you can build it again, but it will cost you money and time.\nIf you replace the building while it's processing something, you'll lose the processed products.

Text.jp: You can always sell the products or animals using the truck.\nClick with it to select what you want to sell.
Text.sc: You can always sell the products or animals using the truck.\nClick with it to select what you want to sell.

Text.jp: Move the mouse cursor over the product that you want to sell.\nNote the frame with buttons next to selected product.
Text.sc: Move the mouse cursor over the product that you want to sell.\nNote the frame with buttons next to selected product.

Text.jp: Use the buttons to choose the number of products that you want to sell.
Text.sc: Use the buttons to choose the number of products that you want to sell.

Text.jp: When you choose everything that you want to sell, click the SEND button to send the truck to the city.
Text.sc: When you choose everything that you want to sell, click the SEND button to send the truck to the city.

Text.jp: You can follow the delivery progress bar in the pop-up window.
Text.sc: You can follow the delivery progress bar in the pop-up window.

Text.jp: To make certain goods, you need to order goods from the city. Don't worry! Click on the plane to open the menu that items that you can order in the city.
Text.sc: To make certain goods, you need to order goods from the city. Don't worry! Click on the plane to open the menu that items that you can order in the city.

Text.jp: Move the mouse cursor over the product that you want to order.\nNote the frame with buttons next to selected product.
Text.sc: Move the mouse cursor over the product that you want to order.\nNote the frame with buttons next to selected product.

Text.jp: Use the buttons to choose the number of products that you want to order.
Text.sc: Use the buttons to choose the number of products that you want to order.

Text.jp: When you choose everything that you want to order, click the ORDER button to send the plane to the city.
Text.sc: When you choose everything that you want to order, click the ORDER button to send the plane to the city.

Text.jp: You can follow the delivery progress bar in the pop-up window.
Text.sc: You can follow the delivery progress bar in the pop-up window.

Text.jp: Be careful, because a real bear can appear ont he farm! \nThese predators ruin beds and scare animals not allowing them to produce goods.
Text.sc: Be careful, because a real bear can appear ont he farm! \nThese predators ruin beds and scare animals not allowing them to produce goods.

Text.jp: You can drive away bears or catch them. You can sell a bear in the city.\nClick on it several times to catch the animal.
Text.sc: You can drive away bears or catch them. You can sell a bear in the city.\nClick on it several times to catch the animal.

Text.jp: Once the animal is caught, click on it to send the bear to the storehouse, and then sell it.
Text.sc: Once the animal is caught, click on it to send the bear to the storehouse, and then sell it.

Text.jp: Another harmful animal on the farm is a mole.\nIt appears next to a good and steals it!
Text.sc: Another harmful animal on the farm is a mole.\nIt appears next to a good and steals it!

Text.jp: Click on the mole to save your precious products and drive away the villain from the field!
Text.sc: Click on the mole to save your precious products and drive away the villain from the field!

Text.jp: Some thiefs are really smart and protect their heads with buckets! It will take you longer to drive them away.
Text.sc: Some thiefs are really smart and protect their heads with buckets! It will take you longer to drive them away.

Text.jp: The smartest moles appear in hard hats that protect them for long.
Text.sc: The smartest moles appear in hard hats that protect them for long.

Text.jp: Cat on the farm will be a good helper. It not only collects products but also takes them from moles!
Text.sc: Cat on the farm will be a good helper. It not only collects products but also takes them from moles!

Text.jp: When bears see dogs, they panic and become easy to catch!
Text.sc: When bears see dogs, they panic and become easy to catch!

Text.jp: Use the combo multiplier to earn more money.
Text.sc: Use the combo multiplier to earn more money.

Text.jp: Every action on the farm wills the bar of the combo multiplier, and it grows. If you grow grass, collect products, refill the well, or catch a bear - all these actions will fill the bar of the combo multiplier. The combo multiplier has several marks and a certain sum next to each mark that you get once you reach this or that mark.\nWhen you do nothing, it starts reducing.\nTo clear the bar, do nothing for some time or exceed the maximum mark of the combo multiplier.
Text.sc: Every action on the farm wills the bar of the combo multiplier, and it grows. If you grow grass, collect products, refill the well, or catch a bear - all these actions will fill the bar of the combo multiplier. The combo multiplier has several marks and a certain sum next to each mark that you get once you reach this or that mark.\nWhen you do nothing, it starts reducing.\nTo clear the bar, do nothing for some time or exceed the maximum mark of the combo multiplier.

Text.jp: On the farm, there are items that help to fill the combo multiplier. These items can turn out to be a flying bird, an owl on the fence, an apple on the tree, etc.
Text.sc: On the farm, there are items that help to fill the combo multiplier. These items can turn out to be a flying bird, an owl on the fence, an apple on the tree, etc.

Text.jp: Try to memorize such objects and click on them, ince they appear. This will help to fill the combo multiplier.
Text.sc: Try to memorize such objects and click on them, ince they appear. This will help to fill the combo multiplier.

Text.jp: Every animals feels liking to another animals. Animals can show this when they meet on the field.
Text.sc: Every animals feels liking to another animals. Animals can show this when they meet on the field.

Text.jp: They produce a unique product that can provide ou with bonuses once collected.
Text.sc: They produce a unique product that can provide ou with bonuses once collected.

Text.jp: Complete levels with gold and silver to acquire collection items. Complete a level with gold and get two collection items. Complete a level with silver and get one item.
Text.sc: Complete levels with gold and silver to acquire collection items. Complete a level with gold and get two collection items. Complete a level with silver and get one item.

Text.jp: You can exchange collection items in the store that is on the farm.
Text.sc: You can exchange collection items in the store that is on the farm.

Text.jp: Exchange items for bonuses in order to complete difficult levels.
Text.sc: Exchange items for bonuses in order to complete difficult levels.

Text.jp: Click on the EXCHANGE button to use collections and get a bonus for the next level.
Text.sc: Click on the EXCHANGE button to use collections and get a bonus for the next level.

Text.jp:
This is a hen. It produces eggs required for making egg blend.
It feels liking to a pig.
 They both produce a unique egg.
Collect the egg to make all animals on the field produce products.
Text.sc:
This is a hen. It produces eggs required for making egg blend.
It feels liking to a pig.
 They both produce a unique egg.
Collect the egg to make all animals on the field produce products.

Text.jp: This is a cow. It produces milk required for making cream.\nIt feels liking to the cat.\They both produce the nut butter.\nOnce the nut butter is collected, the productivity of all buildings doubles for 30 seconds.
Text.sc: This is a cow. It produces milk required for making cream.\nIt feels liking to the cat.\They both produce the nut butter.\nOnce the nut butter is collected, the productivity of all buildings doubles for 30 seconds.

Text.jp:
This is a dog. It helps to catch bears.
The dog feels liking to the sheep.
They both produce the warm sweater.
Once the warm sweater is collected, the combo multiplier fills up to the nearest mark.

This is a dog. It helps to catch bears.
The dog feels liking to the sheep.
They both produce the warm sweater.
Once the warm sweater is collected, the combo multiplier fills up to the nearest mark.

Text.jp:
It produces pork meat required for making steaks.
It feels liking to a hen.
 They both produce a unique egg.
Collect the egg to make all animals on the field produce products.

It produces pork meat required for making steaks.
It feels liking to a hen.
 They both produce a unique egg.
Collect the egg to make all animals on the field produce products.

Text.jp: This is a bear! Bears scare animals and prevent them from producing goods. Click on the bear to catch it. You can sell bears on the market.
Text.sc: This is a bear! Bears scare animals and prevent them from producing goods. Click on the bear to catch it. You can sell bears on the market.

Text.jp: This is a cat. It helps to collect products and takes them from moles.\nIt feels liking to the cow.\They both produce the nut butter.\nOnce the nut butter is collected, the productivity of all buildings doubles for 30 seconds.
Text.sc: This is a cat. It helps to collect products and takes them from moles.\nIt feels liking to the cow.\They both produce the nut butter.\nOnce the nut butter is collected, the productivity of all buildings doubles for 30 seconds.

Text.jp:
This is a sheep. It produces wool required for making threads
The sheep feels liking to the dog.
They both produce the warm sweater.
Once the warm sweater is collected, the combo multiplier fills up to the nearest mark.
Text.sc:
This is a sheep. It produces wool required for making threads
The sheep feels liking to the dog.
They both produce the warm sweater.
Once the warm sweater is collected, the combo multiplier fills up to the nearest mark.

Text.jp: This is a thief mole. They appear in the most unexpected moment and can steal your products! Click on the mole to save your product and drive the thief away!
Text.sc: This is a thief mole. They appear in the most unexpected moment and can steal your products! Click on the mole to save your product and drive the thief away!

Text.jp: This is a clever mole. Do you see a bucket on its head? It protects the mole from the hammer and allows it to stay on the field longer.
Text.sc: This is a clever mole. Do you see a bucket on its head? It protects the mole from the hammer and allows it to stay on the field longer.

Text.jp: This is the most cunning mole. It wears a hard hat to prtect itself and stay on the field for long.
Text.sc: This is the most cunning mole. It wears a hard hat to prtect itself and stay on the field for long.

Text.jp: Terrific results! Your grandma and grandpa will be proud of you!
Text.sc: Terrific results! Your grandma and grandpa will be proud of you!

Text.jp: Not bad! There is no limit to perfection!
Text.sc: Not bad! There is no limit to perfection!

Text.jp: We've always known that you're a born farmer!
Text.sc: We've always known that you're a born farmer!

Text.jp: Don't worry! The most important is that the task is completed!
Text.sc: Don't worry! The most important is that the task is completed!

Text.jp: Wow, you're a genius! If you continue working like this, you will pay off the debt of their relatives very fast!
Text.sc: Wow, you're a genius! If you continue working like this, you will pay off the debt of their relatives very fast!

Text.jp: Well, not bad! Though I know that you can do better!
Text.sc: Well, not bad! Though I know that you can do better!

Text.jp: Well, not bad! Though I know that you can do better!
Text.sc: Well, not bad! Though I know that you can do better!

Text.jp: Why are you so long? I hired you for different things!
Text.sc: Why are you so long? I hired you for different things!

Text.jp: Oh! You are a farm genius!
Text.sc: Oh! You are a farm genius!

Text.jp: Very good! Thank you for your work!
Text.sc: Very good! Thank you for your work!

Text.jp: It's a bit not in time, but thanks anyway!
Text.sc: It's a bit not in time, but thanks anyway!

Text.jp: Wow! Perhaps I can even learn something from you!
Text.sc: Wow! Perhaps I can even learn something from you!

Text.jp: Hah! You did everything so quickly!
Text.sc: Hah! You did everything so quickly!

Text.jp: Hah! You did everything so quickly!
Text.sc: Hah! You did everything so quickly!

Text.jp: It's fine! Sometimes I also don't cope well with tasks!
Text.sc: It's fine! Sometimes I also don't cope well with tasks!

Text.jp: Did you grandparents send you here?
Text.sc: Did you grandparents send you here?

Text.jp: You reminds me of myself when I was younger!
Text.sc: You reminds me of myself when I was younger!

Text.jp: It's quite not bad for your age.
Text.sc: It's quite not bad for your age.

Text.jp: Don't worry! You can always start over again!
Text.sc: Don't worry! You can always start over again!

Text.jp: Help us to prepare for the holiday!
Text.sc: Help us to prepare for the holiday!

Text.jp: Your talent will help us to prepare everything in the twinkling of an eye!
Text.sc: Your talent will help us to prepare everything in the twinkling of an eye!

Text.jp: We won't finish everything in time!
Text.sc: We won't finish everything in time!

Text.jp: I must help me to reach my home!
Text.sc: I must help me to reach my home!

Text.jp: I will get home very soon!
Text.sc: I will get home very soon!

Text.jp: I like to work with all my heart!
Text.sc: I like to work with all my heart!

Text.jp: I will work harder next time...
Text.sc: I will work harder next time...

Text.jp: Use collections to achieve better results!
Text.sc: Use collections to achieve better results!

Text.jp: Select items that you want to exchange!
Text.sc: Select items that you want to exchange!

Text.jp: Use collections to complete levels with better results!
Text.sc: Use collections to complete levels with better results!

Text.jp: A player with this name already exists!
Text.sc: A player with this name already exists!

Text.jp: Click on the Wheel to start working!
Text.sc: Click on the Wheel to start working!

Text.jp: Click on the icon next to the map to start the work on the farm!
Text.sc: Click on the icon next to the map to start the work on the farm!

Text.jp: Click on grandparents icons to help them!
Text.sc: Click on grandparents icons to help them!

Text.jp: Click on the Trader icon to start completing tasks!
Text.sc: Click on the Trader icon to start completing tasks!

Text.jp: Click on the Chief cook icon to rescue the poor thing!
Text.sc: Click on the Chief cook icon to rescue the poor thing!

Text.jp: Click on the Mayor icon to fulfill his request!
Text.sc: Click on the Mayor icon to fulfill his request!

Text.jp: Click on the Bakery cook. He can't cope alone!
Text.sc: Click on the Bakery cook. He can't cope alone!

Text.jp: Click on the Elder's icon to help him in farming!
Text.sc: Click on the Elder's icon to help him in farming!

Text.jp: Click the alien icon to help him get back home!
Text.sc: Click the alien icon to help him get back home!

Text.jp: Now you can try to improve your results using farming skills you acquired!
Text.sc: Now you can try to improve your results using farming skills you acquired!

Text.jp: Click on the well to enable auto watering mode.
Text.sc: Click on the well to enable auto watering mode.

Text.jp: Are you sure you want to quit the game?
Text.sc: Are you sure you want to quit the game?

Text.jp: Try to finish levels with better results! Play this level again?
Text.sc: Try to finish levels with better results! Play this level again?

Text.jp: Select levels and replay them any moment. Levels completed with gold and silver medals, display a corresponding goblet. The lock icon next to a level means that this level is locked.
Text.sc: Select levels and replay them any moment. Levels completed with gold and silver medals, display a corresponding goblet. The lock icon next to a level means that this level is locked.

Text.jp: The achievments menu will open after you complete the seventh level!
Text.sc: The achievments menu will open after you complete the seventh level!

Text.jp: You cannot create more than 10 players!
Text.sc: You cannot create more than 10 players!

Text.jp: Press Esc to skip the video
Text.sc: Press Esc to skip the video

Text.jp: The game cannot run in this mode.
Text.sc: The game cannot run in this mode.

Text.jp: It is a replace button. Click it to replace the Bakery with Cutting shop. Remember, if you replace the building while it is processing, the processed products will be lost!
Text.sc: It is a replace button. Click it to replace the Bakery with Cutting shop. Remember, if you replace the building while it is processing, the processed products will be lost!

Text.jp: To start the tutorial, restart the level!
Text.sc: To start the tutorial, restart the level!

Text.jp: You haven't received any awards yet!
Text.sc: You haven't received any awards yet!

Text.jp: Here you can find all awards you received and are supposed to receive.
Text.sc: Here you can find all awards you received and are supposed to receive.

Text.jp: Nut butter\ndoubles productivity of all buildings for 30 seconds.
Text.sc: Nut butter\ndoubles productivity of all buildings for 30 seconds.

Text.jp: Thank you for playing "Farm Frenzy 4", Please take a moment to fill out the survey!
Text.sc: Thank you for playing "Farm Frenzy 4", Please take a moment to fill out the survey!

Text.jp: Ah, Yes... I completely forgot about one important thing! You can change the position of the camera on the location at any time you want. To do so, use the mouse scroll. Try to select the most convenient angle.
Text.sc: Ah, Yes... I completely forgot about one important thing! You can change the position of the camera on the location at any time you want. To do so, use the mouse scroll. Try to select the most convenient angle.

Text.jp: The hen is going to lay an egg! To collect a product, click on it. You can also click on any product, hold the left mouse button, and move the cursor over other products.
Text.sc: The hen is going to lay an egg! To collect a product, click on it. You can also click on any product, hold the left mouse button, and move the cursor over other products.

Text.jp: Click on the bear to catch it. Caught bears are sent to the warehouse, where you can find all animals you own. By the way, if you catch a bear, the combo multiplier will fill, too.
Text.sc: Click on the bear to catch it. Caught bears are sent to the warehouse, where you can find all animals you own. By the way, if you catch a bear, the combo multiplier will fill, too.

Text.jp: Check other pairs of animals, too. Each pair will produce its unique object. Please note, each pair of animals produces the product only once at the first meeting, so buy animals wisely.
Text.sc: Check other pairs of animals, too. Each pair will produce its unique object. Please note, each pair of animals produces the product only once at the first meeting, so buy animals wisely.

Text.jp: A good kick! Continue clicking on it until the mole gets that you’re not a person to jest with and runs away from the field. Once you get rid of the mole, you get a reward!
Text.sc: A good kick! Continue clicking on it until the mole gets that you’re not a person to jest with and runs away from the field. Once you get rid of the mole, you get a reward!

Text.jp: Move your mouse over the mole and click on it. Once you get rid of the mole, you get a reward!
Text.sc: Move your mouse over the mole and click on it. Once you get rid of the mole, you get a reward!

Text.jp: This button will become available after the second level!
Text.sc: This button will become available after the second level!

Text.jp: This button will become available after the third level!
Text.sc: This button will become available after the third level!

Text.jp: The game does not support this screen resolution.
Text.sc: The game does not support this screen resolution.

Text.jp:
Congratulations!\n
You've completed the demo of Farm Frenzy 4! Purchase the full version to find out how the story ends!\n
The full version comes with: - 90 captivating levels in four vibrant locations! - Six productive and four destructive animals! - 15 production buildings with multiple production lines! - 28 products, including three products that provide bonuses! - Four all-new game enhancing mechanics: Combo Multiplier, Shooting Gallery, Collections and Animal Friendships! - 34 achievements!
Text.sc:
Congratulations!\n
You've completed the demo of Farm Frenzy 4! Purchase the full version to find out how the story ends!\n
The full version comes with: - 90 captivating levels in four vibrant locations! - Six productive and four destructive animals! - 15 production buildings with multiple production lines! - 28 products, including three products that provide bonuses! - Four all-new game enhancing mechanics: Combo Multiplier, Shooting Gallery, Collections and Animal Friendships! - 34 achievements!

Text.jp: The system lacks audio output equipment.
Text.sc: The system lacks audio output equipment.

Text.jp: This computer does not meet the game’s minimum system requirements. The game either will not function or will not display properly.
Text.sc: This computer does not meet the game’s minimum system requirements. The game either will not function or will not display properly.

Text.jp: Вы уверены, что хотите начать игру заново? Прогресс по игре будет утерян!
Text.sc: Вы уверены, что хотите начать игру заново? Прогресс по игре будет утерян!

Text.jp: Вы уверены, что хотите покинуть игру? Весь несохраненный прогресс будет утерян.
Text.sc: Вы уверены, что хотите покинуть игру? Весь несохраненный прогресс будет утерян.

Text.jp: Его всегда можно сменить в вашем доме на ферме.
Text.sc: Его всегда можно сменить в вашем доме на ферме.

Text.jp: Вы уверены, что хотите продать коллекцию %collection_name% за
Text.sc: Вы уверены, что хотите продать коллекцию %collection_name% за

Text.jp: Помните, что одновременно можно использовать только один бонус коллекции! Если вы продадите коллекцию, то активируете бонус, начав текущий уровень. Если вы покинете или перезапустите уровень, то бонус сгорит.
Text.sc: Помните, что одновременно можно использовать только один бонус коллекции! Если вы продадите коллекцию, то активируете бонус, начав текущий уровень. Если вы покинете или перезапустите уровень, то бонус сгорит.

Text.jp: Животные будут производить продукты на две секунды быстрее.
Text.sc: Животные будут производить продукты на две секунды быстрее.

Text.jp: Транспорт будет двигаться на две секунды быстрее.
Text.sc: Транспорт будет двигаться на две секунды быстрее.

Text.jp: Каждая секунда уровня будет приносить пять монет.
Text.sc: Каждая секунда уровня будет приносить пять монет.

Text.jp: Здания, перерабатывающие шерсть, будут работать на 30\% быстрее
Text.sc: Здания, перерабатывающие шерсть, будут работать на 30\% быстрее

Text.jp: Убирает с уровня всех кротов и медведей.
Text.sc: Убирает с уровня всех кротов и медведей.

Text.jp: Автомобиль отвозит товары на четыре секунды быстрее.
Text.sc: Автомобиль отвозит товары на четыре секунды быстрее.

Text.jp: Все пищевые здания будут работать на 10\% быстрее.
Text.sc: Все пищевые здания будут работать на 10\% быстрее.

Text.jp: Все здания будут работать на две секунды быстрее.
Text.sc: Все здания будут работать на две секунды быстрее.

Text.jp: Позволит заменить одно из зданий бесплатно.
Text.sc: Позволит заменить одно из зданий бесплатно.

Text.jp: Уровень начнется с тремя бесплатными курицами
Text.sc: Уровень начнется с тремя бесплатными курицами

Text.jp: Комбометр заполнится в два раза быстрее
Text.sc: Комбометр заполнится в два раза быстрее

Text.jp: Да я из тебя отбивную сделаю!
Text.sc: Да я из тебя отбивную сделаю!

Text.jp: И с дымком, и с блинком
Text.sc: И с дымком, и с блинком

Text.jp: А у меня никого нет... даже собаки
Text.sc: А у меня никого нет... даже собаки

Text.jp: На чем она, говоришь, у тебя летает?
Text.sc: На чем она, говоришь, у тебя летает?

Text.jp: За прохождение обучающих уровней на золото.
Text.sc: За прохождение обучающих уровней на золото.

Text.jp: За открытие всех персонажей на планете.
Text.sc: За открытие всех персонажей на планете.

Text.jp: За покупку пяти собак на уровне.
Text.sc: За покупку пяти собак на уровне.

Text.jp: За покупку трех собак и трех котов на уровне.
Text.sc: За покупку трех собак и трех котов на уровне.

Text.jp: За покупку пяти животных каждого вида на уровне.
Text.sc: За покупку пяти животных каждого вида на уровне.

Text.jp: За снос одного здания, чтобы построить на его месте другое.
Text.sc: За снос одного здания, чтобы построить на его месте другое.

Text.jp: За прохождение всех уровней без потерь продуктов.
Text.sc: За прохождение всех уровней без потерь продуктов.

Text.jp: За максимальное улучшение всех зданий и транспорта на уровне.
Text.sc: За максимальное улучшение всех зданий и транспорта на уровне.

Text.jp: За медведя на поле в течение 30 секунд и более.
Text.sc: За медведя на поле в течение 30 секунд и более.

Text.jp: За сбор всех коллекций по одному разу.
Text.sc: За сбор всех коллекций по одному разу.

Text.jp: За постройку здания и его улучшение до максимума.
Text.sc: За постройку здания и его улучшение до максимума.

Text.jp: За загрузку здания последнего уровня сырьем пять раз подряд.
Text.sc: За загрузку здания последнего уровня сырьем пять раз подряд.

Text.jp: За прохождение уровня, не прикасаясь к продуктам.
Text.sc: За прохождение уровня, не прикасаясь к продуктам.

Text.jp: За дозволение собакам закрывать в коробки всех медведей на уровне.
Text.sc: За дозволение собакам закрывать в коробки всех медведей на уровне.

Text.jp: За то, что одно животное не голодало ни на одном уровне.
Text.sc: За то, что одно животное не голодало ни на одном уровне.

Text.jp: За потерю в ходе игры на всех уровнях 30 продуктов из-за переполненного склада.
Text.sc: За потерю в ходе игры на всех уровнях 30 продуктов из-за переполненного склада.

Text.jp: За игру в Веселую ферму 4 в течение часа без остановки.
Text.sc: За игру в Веселую ферму 4 в течение часа без остановки.

Text.jp: За отправку только полных грузовиков в город на уровне.
Text.sc: За отправку только полных грузовиков в город на уровне.

Text.jp: За прохождение уровня без пустых щелчков мышью.
Text.sc: За прохождение уровня без пустых щелчков мышью.

Text.jp: За продажу всех животных, чтобы пройти уровень.
Text.sc: За продажу всех животных, чтобы пройти уровень.

Text.jp: За завершение уровня без монет на счете.
Text.sc: За завершение уровня без монет на счете.

Text.jp: За игру в Веселую ферму 4 в течение 12 часов.
Text.sc: За игру в Веселую ферму 4 в течение 12 часов.

Text.jp: За завершение уровня с пустым складом.
Text.sc: За завершение уровня с пустым складом.

Text.jp: За прохождение одного уровня более пяти раз.
Text.sc: За прохождение одного уровня более пяти раз.

Text.jp: За потерю продукта при наличии кота и неполного склада.
Text.sc: За потерю продукта при наличии кота и неполного склада.

Text.jp: За нахождение на одном уровне всех предметов, по которым можно щелкнуть.
Text.sc: За нахождение на одном уровне всех предметов, по которым можно щелкнуть.

Text.jp: За покупку одного животного каждого вида подряд.
Text.sc: За покупку одного животного каждого вида подряд.

Text.jp: За спасение животного от голода за менее чем три секунды до его сна.
Text.sc: За спасение животного от голода за менее чем три секунды до его сна.

Text.jp: За прохождение уровня без прерывания комбометра.
Text.sc: За прохождение уровня без прерывания комбометра.

Text.jp: За покупку 10 животных одного вида подряд.
Text.sc: За покупку 10 животных одного вида подряд.

Text.jp: За получение 500 монет за один уровень с помощью комбометра.
Text.sc: За получение 500 монет за один уровень с помощью комбометра.

Text.jp: За прохождение всех уровней на золото.
Text.sc: За прохождение всех уровней на золото.

Text.jp: Бабушка, дедушка... Как же давно мы не виделись. Именно они научили меня всем фермерским премудростям. Счастливая тогда была пора...
Text.sc: Бабушка, дедушка... Как же давно мы не виделись. Именно они научили меня всем фермерским премудростям. Счастливая тогда была пора...

Text.jp: Теперь у меня есть своя ферма, и я знаю, какой это большой труд - вести собственное хозяйство. Эх... Пора вернуться к работе.
Text.sc: Теперь у меня есть своя ферма, и я знаю, какой это большой труд - вести собственное хозяйство. Эх... Пора вернуться к работе.

Text.jp: Бабушка, дедушка, здравствуйте! Как же давно мы не виделись!
Text.sc: Бабушка, дедушка, здравствуйте! Как же давно мы не виделись!

Text.jp: Привет, заходи скорее! Мы только о тебе вспоминали!
Text.sc: Привет, заходи скорее! Мы только о тебе вспоминали!

Text.jp: Здравствуй! Пойдем скорее в дом. Ой, что же это я! Хотела пирог испечь, а яиц нет. Сейчас принесу.
Text.sc: Здравствуй! Пойдем скорее в дом. Ой, что же это я! Хотела пирог испечь, а яиц нет. Сейчас принесу.

Text.jp: Погоди секунду, я помощника позову. Эй, Колесик, подкатись-ка сюда, пожалуйста.
Text.sc: Погоди секунду, я помощника позову. Эй, Колесик, подкатись-ка сюда, пожалуйста.

Text.jp: Это Колесик - мы купили его у торговца нам в помощь, но оказалось, что он ничего не умеет, зато...
Text.sc: Это Колесик - мы купили его у торговца нам в помощь, но оказалось, что он ничего не умеет, зато...

Text.jp: Зато все знаю. Я был роботом-экскурсоводом в музее истории фермерства. Приятно познакомиться!
Text.sc: Зато все знаю. Я был роботом-экскурсоводом в музее истории фермерства. Приятно познакомиться!

Text.jp: Мне тоже. Ну что ж, за дело?
Text.sc: Мне тоже. Ну что ж, за дело?

Text.jp:
Здравствуйте, дорогие бабушка и дедушка!

Как ваше здоровье? Простите, что так долго не было писем. Как там поживают овечки, котенок, пес и все остальные? Вы, наверное, очень скучаете? Я тоже по вам очень скучаю. Большое спасибо за приглашение, наконец-то у меня появилась возможность вас навестить. Скоро буду.

Ваш внук Джо
Text.sc:
Здравствуйте, дорогие бабушка и дедушка!

Как ваше здоровье? Простите, что так долго не было писем. Как там поживают овечки, котенок, пес и все остальные? Вы, наверное, очень скучаете? Я тоже по вам очень скучаю. Большое спасибо за приглашение, наконец-то у меня появилась возможность вас навестить. Скоро буду.

Ваш внук Джо
